text: Now and Then is a 1995 comedy-drama movie. It is about four women in two different time periods: 1970 and 1991. Demi Moore plays Samantha Albertson, Christina Ricci and Rosie O'Donnell play Roberta Martin, Thora Birch and Melanie Griffith act as Tina "Teeny" Tercell. Lolita Davidovich plays Samantha's mom. It was released on October 20, 1995. Reviews for this comedy- drama were very negative, although Now and Then has since become a classic. Category:1995 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:English-language movies
title: Now and Then (movie)
